sources.title: 1975 - Paper Tiger - David Niven - They saw him as a hero ... but could he live up to it?
sources.description:
When a storyteller's tall tales become his reality!
Major Bradbury is hired as the tutor to the son of the Japanese ambassador, spins wild war stories to his young pupil. His life changes when he and the boy are kidnapped by terrorists for political purposes.

Original Title: Paper Tiger (1975)

metadata.Plot: A somewhat prim and proper Englishman is hired as the tutor to the son of the Japanese ambassador. His life changes when he and the boy are kidnapped by terrorists for political purposes.
